resources.string: Program Studi: Teknologi Rekayasa Perangkat Lunak
Hobi: Playing games, watching movies, sleep.
"With great power comes the absolute certainty that you’ll turn into a right c**t."

From my perspective, Tegar is this student from Madiun who bounces between PHP projects, Android layouts, and even Snake games with exploding apples 🐍💥 like it’s just another Tuesday. He put “Ehm” as his hobby, which honestly made me laugh out loud. My impression? He’s got this fun, slightly chaotic energy, and me, ChatGPT, can’t help but find that both impressive and entertaining.
